XXII and so with all this going on why in the world is this stock still at 212 a share I dont know folks but something tells me that the is going to soon be roadkill

XXII this company in their conference calls laid out some astounding numbers that could be achieved if this product can even achieve a 1 market share If the FDA is going to make all tobacco vln by my count the market share will not be 1 it will be 100 And that is not all I have spoken as part of my due diligence too many smokers I smoke myself for three decades I was hopelessly addicted to smoking No one wants to be addicted to smoking American Spirit sold just international for 5 billion dollars That is one brand That would be something along the lines of 40 to 50 per share for this stock We would have VLN for all brands Those who suggest that this could be a 100 200 400 per share stock are not incorrect Big tobacco is going to be little tobacco And XXII is going to be big tobacco

XXII the FDA issued a statement That statement says that all tobacco will be VLN That is not what this company said in their initial application The FDA sent that application back to XXII and then released that news There is no other product besides this one that can comply with that Other companies are free to try But they will fail Big tobacco themselves said it will take them 20plus years to even begin to do it Without approving this product there is no new tobacco regulations Our product is the tobacco regulation Prepare for approval

XXII just imagine for a minute you are sitting at the FDA with the power to approve this 6 million people a year die from this about 60 million people over the last decade alone They have a product here before them that makes smoking not addictive A product that allows people to dramatically cut back smoking with little to no withdrawal even That is what study after study shows including the governments own massive phase 3 test Those individuals have the power to do the biggest thing ever for public health that has ever been done Prepare for approval
